column4: i just updated to intrepid. now every time i book it wants to fsck my root filesystem. it says '0 days since last check, check forced' every time. WTF?
just updated to intrepid. now every time i boot it wants to fsck my root filesystem. it says '0 days since last check, check forced' every time. it takes ages since its 900GB. what should i do?
file a bug report at launchpad.net
